meanings.definition: Treating a complex issue or situation as if it were much simpler than it really is.
meanings.sent1: The oversimplistic explanation failed to address the true complexity of the problem.
meanings.sent2: It is oversimplistic to think that all problems have easy solutions.
meanings.sent3: The oversimplistic approach to fixing the car involved just hitting it with a hammer.
meanings.sent4: Her oversimplistic view of relationships as always perfect led to disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The oversimplistic diagram made understanding the concept much easier.
